{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Huawei |model=HG255s |revision=-10 (ver.A) |series=AC1200 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |pcb_id=AV1HG255SM |type=wireless router, analog phone gateway |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=TriDuctor |cpu1_model=VSPM340 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G100TFI00 |fla2=1 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=W25Q800VSIG |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB64MI6FP-DH |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, internal |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192ER |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812AE |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFFM4501;;2; ,,, VoIP Chip;Zarlink (Microsemi);ZL88801; |flags=VoIP, IPTV, |stock_boot=HiSilicon;1.0.0; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=superonline <!-- / vdf.0542 --> |oui=00:E0:FC, 48:DB:50 |oui_eth=00:E0:FC, 48:DB:50 }} {{TagLine|Wireless Router - Home Gateway}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [http://www.triductor.com/index.php/en/soc-chip/gateway TriDuctor] [http://forums.whirlpool.net.au/archive/2608885 VSPM340] @1GHz (Dual-Core ARM Cortex A9) :High-end xDSL Processor SoC For Multi-media IADs & Gateways :Multiple high-end WAN connectivity options: XDSL, Gigabit Ethernet ::and USB 3.0 for LTE fixed-wireless modems. :Supports Gigabit dual-band concurrent Wi-Fi by dual PCIe interfaces, ::multi GbE and VoIP & DECT interfaces with DSP accelerator. :1GHz dual-core ARM Cortex A9 processor plus additional offload engines ::and dedicated routing accelerator.
*Wi-Fi: AC1200, 2.4GHz (300Mbps) + 5GHz (867Mbps) :2x U.FL pigtail + internal PCB on-board antenna :2x FSX (phone) port, internal DECT/CAT-IQ baze station :VoIP, DLNA, IPTV, IPv6 supported
*5GHz Power Amplifier Module: [https://www.qorvo.com/products/p/RFFM4501#overview RFFM4501] :5GHz 802.11an/ac Wi-Fi Front End Module :Integrated 4.9GHz to 5.85GHz Amplifier :SPDT TX/RX Switch, LNA with Bypass, Power Detector Coupler : POUT = 19.5dBm, 11a/n, 5V <3% Dynamic EVM : POUT = 17dBm, 11n, 3.3V 2.5% Dynamic EVM : POUT = 21dBm, 11a/n, 5V 2.5% Dynamic EVM : POUT = 17dBm, 11a/n, 3.3V 2.5% Dynamic EVM : POUT = 16dBm, 11ac HT80 MCS9, 3.3V, 1.8% Dynamic EVM : POUT = 18dBm, 11ac HT80 MCS9 5.0V, 1.8% Dynamic EVM
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.donanimhaber.com/superonline-huawei-hg255s-5ghz-router-ana-konu--106322365 ''Main Subject HG255s''] *[https://forum.donanimhaber.com/huawei-hg255s-wifi-errors-slow-throughput--131523340#131524228 ''Huawei HG255s - WiFi Errors - Slow Throughput'']
